name: Gravity (itch) (CasualEffects)
description:
2-4 player game inspired by the first PDP-1 videogame, SPACEWAR!

Plays best with game controllers.

Engine thrust, shield, and firing torpedoes require rechargeable energy. Time your moves to deplete your opponents' energy and conserve your own.

With experienced control, you can perform advanced moves from the same simple inputs:

  • Wraparound shots
  • Minelaying
  • Drifting/skidding
  • Planet busting
  • Figure 8 orbits
  • Sun and planet gravity slingshot
  • Ramming
  • Lagrange points
  • Atmospheric skipping

As you progress, special new solar system configurations will appear.
